description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Sidebar' that renders a navigational sidebar with links to different sections of an educational content management system. It uses React Router's NavLink component for navigation and dynamically shows the 'Admin Dashboard' link based on the user's role fetched via the useAuth hook.

methods.name: Sidebar()
methods.description: Functional React component that renders the sidebar with navigation links, conditionally displaying certain links based on user role.
